head.title: Welcome to the Nicotine Remedies website

about.title: About Us
about.heading: Meet HINIC - the number one nicotine supplier!
about.minititle: We have experience - We focus on development
about.text-subtwo: Now that we have mastered nicotine extraction to perfection, we are proud to produce and offer a wide choice of nicotine purities. We offer nicotine in purities ranging from 99.5% to 99.9%, so ideal for any type of product. Not only do we use our experience to produce top-quality end products, but we also focus our development on research, which is constantly present in our activities so important for bringing new products to market according to the needs of our customers.
about.text-subthree: We are experienced in production processes, so our products achieve the highest standards, as well as safety procedures are always followed. Our curiosity revolves around extracting the best ingredients from tobacco leaves and subjecting them to a series of extractions and purifications so as to provide our consumers with the most natural and pure nicotine liquid.
about.text-one: HINIC can be your number one online supplier of pure nicotine. Our product is tailored to meet the growing needs of entrepreneurs in need of high quality USP-grade Premium Nicotine that can be used in a range of products such as nicotine patches, chewing gum and liquids prepared and used specifically for use in electronic cigarettes.
about.text-two: HINIC offers only the purest nicotine, while giving a fair and appropriate price for your business.
about.choice-text: Hinic is always consistent with the strategy that an innovative approach generates product quality that is in line with the consumer's expectations. Now that we have mastered nicotine extraction to perfection, we are proud to produce and offer a wide choice of nicotine purities. We offer nicotine in purities ranging from 99.5% to 99.9%, so ideal for all types of products.
about.quality-text: Hinic offers only the highest quality nicotine products. Our liquids, extracted from the highest quality tobacco plants, are carefully manufactured in FDA-tested facilities and in accordance with cGMP (current Good Manufacturing Practices) guidelines to ensure 100% customer satisfaction in both the taste and safety zones.
about.perfect-text: We deliver our products anywhere in the world according to the demand of our consumers. Dotox is a reliable supplier of high quality nicotine. With our partners being key suppliers in the logistics industry, we ensure fast, responsible and convenient transportation to your door with the lowest international shipping charges available. We also have a team to help you track, check and coordinate the status of your shipment.
about.prices-text: Hinic offers only the purest nicotine, while giving a fair and appropriate price for your business. We value our customers and always support their business. None of our competitors offer the same quality of products that we offer at such good prices.
about.services-text: Hinic understands that effective customer service can be a huge business value. It is always our goal to stick to our principles, ensuring efficiency and meeting all of our Consumers' expectations. The Dotox team strives to ensure that our customers are part of everything we do. From product ordering to delivery, we monitor the entire process, so you will be able to wait for delivery with complete confidence in our services and capabilities.
about.experience-text: With many years of experience in the production of pure nicotine, our company stands out as an industry leader. Thanks to our experience, we provide efficient and proven logistics, which guarantees the highest quality of our products.
about.performance-text: Our emphasis is on providing competitive prices without compromising on quality. Our services are tailored to meet the individual needs of our clients, combining affordability with efficiency.
about.research-text: Innovation is at the heart of our business. We invest significant resources in research and development. Our research work focuses on the continuous improvement of our products, ensuring that our solutions are not only advanced but also effective.

products.title: Our Offer
products.header: We offer professional nicotine products to meet the growing market demand and customers with different requirements.
products.text-one: More than 300 satisfied customers throughout Poland
products.text-two: The innovative approach generates product quality that is in line with consumer expectations.
products.text-three: We offer professional nicotine products to meet the growing market demand and customers with different requirements.
products.text-four: You can read our <0>price list</0> below or download it to your phone:
products.form-text: Send a message and find out more about our product range!
products.form-subtext: Once you have sent your message, we will make the price lists available to you and you will be able to download them in .pdf format to your device.
products.fire: Sensitive: Protect from direct sunlight and avoid excessive exposure to air sources.
products.warn: Flammable: Keep away from intense heat sources.
products.worker: For adult use only. Keep away from children, pets and unbalanced people.
products.toxic: Toxic: Do not drink or allow direct contact with the solution.
products.warning-one: <0>*Nicotine can be harmful.</0> Do not swallow, place on tongue, eyes or skin. Keep away from children, pets and unbalanced persons. Contact a doctor immediately after skin contact.
products.warning-two: <0>Nicotine can be addictive.</0> This product should not be used by people who: have heart disease; have high blood pressure; are diabetic or allergic to nicotine, glycerine or propylene glycol; are pregnant or breastfeeding. Discontinue use and consult your doctor immediately if you experience any symptoms of nicotine abuse such as nausea vomiting, dizziness, weakness or rapid heartbeat.
products.warning-three: <0>THE PRODUCT CONTAINS NICOTINE, WHICH IS AN ADDICTIVE SUBSTANCE</0>
products.heading: See what we have to offer!
products.nicotine-text: Pure nicotine (above 99.5%).Considered by many manufacturers to be the best pure nicotine on the market.
products.nicotine-warning: *To place an order, please contact us by e-mail
products.nicotinesalt-text: This is a form of nicotine that occurs naturally in tobacco, used in e-cigarette liquids
products.pg-text: PG (Propyleneglycol) and VG (Vegetable Glycerine) are the two main base substances used for the production of e-liquids in e-cigarettes
products.aroma-text: Chemicals added to e-cigarette liquids to impart flavour etc.
products.access-text: Additional ingredients, such as colourings, sweeteners or cooling agents, used to customise the taste and smoking experience.
products.cbd-text: CBD oil is an extract derived from hemp (Cannabis sativa) that contains cannabidiol (CBD) - one of the many chemical compounds found naturally in the hemp plant

order.text-one: We put the welfare of our customers first. Our prices are adjusted to satisfy our consumers. As a supplier, we want to give our customers the chance to earn even more than before by giving them more competitive prices. With our friendly and professional team working together with you, Hiliq Poland offers you quality you will be very satisfied with.
order.text-two: The Hinic Poland team strives to make our customers part of everything we do. From product ordering to delivery, we monitor the entire process, so you will be able to wait for delivery with complete confidence in our services and capabilities.

contact.text-one: Have a question or want to order our product?
contact.text-two: Our office is open from Mon-Fri

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.intro: This privacy policy describes how we process information about you, including personal data and cookies.

section1.title: 1. General Information
section1.content: 1. This policy applies to the website operating at the URL: hinic.eu. 2. The operator of the service and the administrator of personal data is: Hiliq Poland, Postępu 12b/11, NIP: 5361933750, KRS: 0000721432. 3. The operator's contact email address: office@hinic.eu. 4. The Operator is the Administrator of your personal data with respect to the data you voluntarily provide on the Service. 5. The Service uses personal data for the following purposes: a. Running a newsletter b. Handling inquiries via a form c. Preparing, packaging, and shipping goods d. Presenting an offer or information 6. The Service performs functions to obtain information about users and their behavior in the following ways: a. Through data voluntarily entered in forms, which are entered into the Operator's systems. b. By storing cookie files (so-called 'cookies') on end devices.

section2.title: 2. Selected Data Protection Methods
section2.content: 1. Login and personal data entry areas are protected in the transmission layer (SSL certificate). This ensures that personal and login data entered on the site are encrypted on the user's computer and can only be read on the target server. 2. The Operator periodically changes its administrative passwords. 3. For data protection, the Operator regularly performs backups. 4. An important element of data protection is the regular updating of all software used by the Operator for processing personal data, which particularly means regular updates of programming components.

section3.title: 3. Hosting
section3.content: 1. The service is hosted (technically maintained) on the servers of the operator: home.pl. 2. To ensure technical reliability, the hosting company keeps logs at the server level. The following may be recorded: a. resources identified by a URL identifier (addresses of requested resources - pages, files), b. time of request arrival, c. time of sending a response, d. client station name - identification carried out via the HTTP protocol, e. information about errors that occurred during the HTTP transaction, f. URL of the page previously visited by the user (referer link) - if the access to the Service was made through a link, g. information about the user's browser, h. information about the IP address, i. diagnostic information related to the process of self-ordering services through registrars on the site, j. information related to the handling of e-mail addressed to the Operator and sent by the Operator.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights and Additional Information on How Data is Used
section4.content: 1. In certain situations, the Administrator has the right to transfer your personal data to other recipients if it is necessary to perform a contract concluded with you or to fulfill obligations incumbent on the Administrator. This applies to such groups of recipients: a. authorized employees and associates who use the data to fulfill the purpose of the site's operation. 2. Your personal data is processed by the Administrator for no longer than is necessary to perform the related activities defined by separate regulations (e.g., on accounting). Regarding marketing data, data will not be processed for longer than 3 years. 3. You have the right to request from the Administrator: a. access to your personal data, b. their rectification, c. erasure, d. restriction of processing, e. and data portability. 4. You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the Administrator, including profiling, where the right to object shall not be exercised if there are valid legitimate grounds for the processing which override your interests, rights, and freedoms, in particular for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims. 5. Actions of the Administrator may be appealed to the President of the Office for Personal Data Protection, ul. Stawki 2, 00-193 Warsaw. 6. Providing personal data is voluntary but necessary to operate the Service. 7. Automated decision-making, including profiling to provide services under the concluded agreement and for the purpose of direct marketing by the Administrator, may be undertaken in relation to you. 8. Personal data is not transferred from third countries within the meaning of data protection regulations. This means that we do not send them outside the European Union.

section5.title: 5. Information in Forms
section5.content: 1. The service collects information voluntarily provided by the user, including personal data if provided. 2. The service may save information about connection parameters (time stamp, IP address). 3. In some cases, the service may save information that facilitates linking the data in the form with the e-mail address of the user filling out the form. In such a case, the user's e-mail address appears within the URL of the page containing the form. 4. The data provided in the form is processed for the purpose resulting from the function of a specific form, e.g., to handle a service request or business contact, register services, etc. In each case, the context and description of the form clearly inform what it is used for.

section6.title: 6. Administrator Logs
section6.content: 1. Information about user behavior on the service may be subject to logging. This data is used for the administration of the service.

section7.title: 7. Essential Marketing Techniques
section7.content: 1. The operator uses statistical analysis of website traffic via Google Analytics (Google Inc., based in the USA). The operator does not transmit personal data to the operator of this service, only anonymized information. The service is based on the use of cookies on the user's end device. Regarding user preference information collected by the Google advertising network, the user can view and edit the information resulting from cookies using the tool: https://www.google.com/ads/preferences/.

section8.title: 8. Information on Cookies
section8.content: 1. The Service uses cookies. 2. Cookies are IT data, in particular text files, that are stored on the Service User's end device and are intended for use on the Service's websites. Cookies usually contain the name of the website from which they originate, their storage time on the end device, and a unique number. 3. The entity placing cookies on the Service User's end device and accessing them is the Service Operator. 4. Cookies are used for the following purposes: a. maintaining a session of a Service User (after logging in), so the user does not have to re-enter their login and password on each subpage of the Service; b. fulfilling the purposes specified above in the 'Essential Marketing Techniques' section; 5. The Service uses two main types of cookies: 'session' and 'persistent'. 'Session' cookies are temporary files stored on the User's end device until logging out, leaving the website, or turning off the software (web browser). 'Persistent' cookies are stored on the User's end device for the time specified in the cookie parameters or until they are deleted by the User. 6. Web browsing software (web browser) usually allows cookies to be stored on the User's end device by default. Service Users can change their settings in this regard. The web browser allows for the deletion of cookies. It is also possible to automatically block cookies. Detailed information on this subject is contained in the help or documentation of the web browser. 7. Restrictions on the use of cookies may affect some of the functionalities available on the Service's websites. 8. Cookies placed on the Service User's end device may also be used by entities cooperating with the Service Operator, in particular companies: Google (Google Inc. based in the USA), Facebook (Facebook Inc. based in the USA), Twitter (Twitter Inc. based in the USA).

section9.title: 9. Managing Cookies – How to Give and Withdraw Consent in Practice?
section9.content: 1. If you do not wish to receive cookies, you can change your browser settings. We specify that disabling cookies necessary for authentication processes, security, and maintaining user preferences may make it difficult, and in extreme cases impossible, to use websites. 2. To manage your cookie settings, select the web browser you are using from the list below and follow the instructions: o Edge o Internet Explorer o Chrome o Safari o Firefox o Opera Mobile devices: o Android o Safari (iOS) o Windows Phone
